definition: Pang De (-219), general of Cao Wei at the start of the Three Kingdoms period, victor over Guan Yu 關羽|关羽/Pound (name)/Ezra Pound (1885-1972), American poet and translator
huge/enormous/tremendous
surname Pang
variant of 德[de2]
variant of 德[de2]
virtue/goodness/morality/ethics/kindness/favor/character/kind
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Bond Street (London, England)
James Bond

sentences.english: Pang shot an arrow at Guan who was unable to dodge it.
sentences.chinese: 庞德取箭，关羽躲闪不及中箭，回营养伤。

sentences.english: I picked it up and found it was a collection of Pound's translations of Chinese classical poetry.
sentences.chinese: 我拿起来发现这是庞德翻译的中国古典诗词集。

sentences.english: Pound and Eliot importantly go to London, Paris.
sentences.chinese: 庞德和埃利奥特去了伦敦和巴黎。

sentences.english: The singer is slated to be the new Bond girl.
sentences.chinese: 该名歌手被选定接演新一代庞德女郎。

sentences.english: Cathay by Ezra Pound is an epoch-making masterpiece in the history of modern poetry in the west.
sentences.chinese: 庞德的《华夏集》是西方现代诗歌史上划时代的作品。
庞德先生是欣然同意的。

sentences.english: Mr. Ponder loves to communicate with people. That's why he chose teaching when he retired.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢与人交往的性格促使庞德在退休后选择了教书。

sentences.english: Because of this wrong choice, Pound's tragical fate was inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 由于这一错误的选择，庞德的悲剧性命运无法避免。

sentences.english: Ezra Pound and Xu Yuanzhong are representatives among them.
sentences.chinese: 庞德和许渊冲则是其中的代表人物。

sentences.english: Let's look, for example, at a series of photos of Ezra Pound.
sentences.chinese: 比如，我们可以看庞德的一系列照片。

sentences.english: My Dear Pound, here is the poem.
In 1885 , poet ezra pound was born in hailey , idaho.
sentences.chinese: 1885年，诗人以期拉庞德出生在爱达荷州。

sentences.english: Pound was one of the contributors.
sentences.chinese: 庞德是杂志的发起人之一。

sentences.english: It is a collection of Pound's translations of Chinese classical poetry.
sentences.chinese: 这是庞德翻译的中国古典诗词集。

definition: Ma Chao (176-222), general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
Zhao Yun (-229), general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
Sun Ce (175-200), general and major warlord of the Later Han Dynasty
Lü Meng (178-219), general of the southern state of Wu
Lü Bu (-198), general and warlord
Sun Jian (155-191), famous general at end of Han dynasty, forerunner of the southern kingdom of Wu of the Three Kingdoms
Yuan Shao (153-202), general during late Han, subsequently warlord
Cheng Yu (141-220), advisor to General Cao Cao 曹操 during the Three Kingdoms era
Zhang Fei (168-221), general of Shu and blood-brother of Liu Bei in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, famous as fearsome fighter and lover of wine
Liu Biao (142-208), warlord
Lu Su or Lu Zijing 魯子敬|鲁子敬 (172-217), statesman, diplomat and strategist of Eastern Wu 東吳|东吴
the enemy general
Zhou Yu or Chou Yü (175-210), famous general of the southern Wu kingdom and victor of the battle of Redcliff/in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, absolutely no match for Zhuge Liang
Huangfu Song (-195), later Han general and warlord
Liu Bei (161-223), warlord at the end of the Han dynasty and founder of the Han kingdom of Shu 蜀漢|蜀汉 (c. 200-263), later the Shu Han dynasty

Guan Yu (-219), general of Shu and blood-brother of Liu Bei in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, fearsome fighter famous for virtue and loyalty/posthumously worshipped and identified with the guardian Bodhisattva Sangharama
